channel.title: Server Ip Problems

item.title: Server Ip Problems
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Thanks for your reply. I know that 127.0.0.0 let’s you play on your own private server on your own IP, and also 0.0.0.0 does the same thing, but I was others to play with me on roflscape.no-ip.org, but it won’t let me log in.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Ip Problems
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

[quote=“The Provoked, post:1, topic:392826”]I am having some problems with my server Ip, the name of the server Ip in the Gui.Java is like this:

[code]private Gui(String args[])
{
super();
try {

		System.out.println("connecting to update server");
		Serverip = "roflscape.no-ip.org";
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName[/code]

My problem is, whenever I try to log in, it says “error connecting to server…” I have No-Ip open and Utorrent open… [/quote]
Change roflscape.no-ip.org to 127.0.0.0 and if u want other players to connect they need to use roflscape.no-ip.org but you just use 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
